name: Holograms
description:
Holograms is a fast paced top down shooter game in which you must get as many kills as possible by shooting zombies. The only catch is that you have very limited ammo, and the game will try and lie to you!

Controls:

Movement: WASD or ARROWS

Shoot: Left Mouse Click

This game was made in one week for the #CommunityGameJam under the theme: The Game Is A Liar.
